I came across an announcement for this contest on the Ninja Dojo film 
board and thought I'd pass it on. There's a small entry fee $6 I think 
BUT the "Winner" gets to keep all the fees collected as their prize!

I never win writing contests but I thought there may be braver souls 
amongst all of you.
www.samurai-archives.com/writcon.html 
<http://www.samurai-archives.com/writcon.html>
